[size=100][color=red]Comedy Nights With Kapil - Hasee toh Phasee - Parineeti - 1st Feb - HQ 480p {DAKU RG} {GreatPalash}[/color][/size]


The episode starts with Kapil cracking his jokes, one liners and wisecracks on the writers and poets, making the audience burst out laughing. Kapil then shifts his focus on the news being printed in the newspapers. Kapil questions the audience about their views on horoscopes and planetary positions. Suddenly, Palak comes shouting and looking for him with a breaking news about an alien escaping, and a huge prize money for catching the alien. Dadi disguises as the alien and asks Kapil to call up the police and claim the huge prize money. Later, Parineeti Chopra and Siddarth Mahlotra join Kapil on the stage to promote their forthcoming movie, Hasee Toh Phasee. Have a hearty laugh, watching the episode.
